### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE market_trends (
    report_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    report_name VARCHAR(255),
    publication_date DATE,
    author_name VARCHAR(100),
    report_content TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE investment_opportunities (
    opportunity_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    opportunity_name VARCHAR(255),
    industry_sector VARCHAR(100),
    investment_type VARCHAR(100),
    investment_amount DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE company_profiles (
    company_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    company_name VARCHAR(255),
    industry_sector VARCHAR(100),
    founded_date DATE,
    ceo_name VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE analysis_data (
    analysis_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    report_id UUID REFERENCES market_trends(report_id),
    company_id UUID REFERENCES company_profiles(company_id),
    opportunity_id UUID REFERENCES investment_opportunities(opportunity_id),
    analysis_date DATE
);
